General.Name: Holitech Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Holitech Technology Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture and sale of components for smart terminals in China and internationally. It offers display modules, touch panels, cover glass, photoelectric sensor products, camera and fingerprint identification modules, electronic paper eco-chain modules, backlight modules, flexible circuit boards, and application products. The products are used in various fields, such as communication equipment, consumer electronics, smart wear, smart cars, smart retail and industrial control, smart commercial display, smart medical, household appliance, digital products, automotive products. The company was formerly known as Shandong Liaherd Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Holitech Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2014. Holitech Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Hanzhong West Road, Putian, China, 351100
